traps.statement: Admiral! We have enemy ships in sector 47!
I've just made a deal that'll keep the Empire out of here forever
Arenâ€™t you a little short for a stormtrooper?
Is he not to destroy the Sith and bring balance to the Force?
Luke, at that speed do you think you'll be able to pull out in time?
Size matters not. Judge me by my size, do you?
I look forward to completing your training. In time you will call me master.
Always two there are, a master and an apprentice.
I find your lack of faith disturbing.
In my experience, there's no such thing as luck.
A Jedi uses the Force for knowledge and defense, never for attack.
